author: HemantMahawar
body:
<!-- PR checklist -->
- [ ] Resolves #xyz.
- [x] Code is up-to-date with `master`.
- [ ] Add tests that fail without your changes.
- [x] Update all relevant [documentation](../docs).

<!-- Provide more details about the PR below -->

Renamed the file and added initial content

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: I don't think this document needs to exist separately. This should all get captured under the official contributing guidelines, as it's the document provided when a contributor beings to open a PR.

comments.author: HemantMahawar
comments.body: Agreed that it should be merged with contribution.md ... cc @joeyaiello @jianyunt

title: Adding content for pull request doc
